property.name: Service Url
property.description: The Url of the cloud or locally hosted instsnce of the SiCDS service

property.name: API Key
property.description: The api key you will need to communicate with the SiCDS service

property.name: TheWord
property.description: Change all conetent to this word

property.name: Ushahidi Url
property.description: The fully qualified url to the Ushahidi instance you want to communicate with (please dont include the API path, just the root)

property.name: Ushahidi Url
property.description: The fully qualified url to the Ushahidi instance you want to communicate with (please don't include the API path, just the root)

property.name: Ushahidi Url
property.description: The url to the Ushahidi instance you want to push reports to.Please don't include the API path, just the root (ex. http://ushahidi.com/).
